info.title: My Laravel API
info.description: This is the API documentation for my Invoices application.

post.description: Authenticate a user and return a JWT token
Returns a list of invoices based on filtering, sorting, and pagination options. Requires authentication.

get.description: Retrieve an invoice by its ID. Requires authentication.

put.description: Updates an existing invoice. Requires authentication.

delete.description: Deletes an invoice by its ID. Requires authentication.

post.description: Creates a new invoice. Requires authentication.
Returns a list of tax profiles based on provided filters, sort, and limit parameters. Requires authentication.

get.description: Retrieve a specific tax profile by its ID. Requires authentication.

put.description: Updates an existing tax profile. Requires authentication.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the tax profile to update

delete.description: Deletes a tax profile by its ID. Requires authentication.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the tax profile to delete

post.description: Creates a new tax profile for the authenticated user.
Returns a list of users based on filter parameters. Requires authentication.

get.description: Returns a single user by ID. Requires authentication.

put.description: Updates an existing user. Requires authentication and proper authorization.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to update

delete.description: Deletes a user by ID. Requires admin privileges.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to delete

post.description: Creates a new user. Requires admin privileges.

requestBody.description: User data to create a new user

rangeValue.description: Secondary value for range filters (if applicable).

PaginatedListFilter.title: Paginated List Filter
PaginatedListFilter.description: Parameters for filtering, sorting, and pagination.

Invoice.title: Invoice
Invoice.description: Invoice model representing an invoice issued to a user

TaxProfile.title: Tax Profile
TaxProfile.description: Tax profile associated with a user, containing tax-related information.

country.description: Country where the company is located

city.description: City where the company is located

zip_code.description: Zip code for the company's location

created_at.description: Timestamp when the tax profile was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the tax profile was last updated
